page.title: 06Family Life in N.W.Guildford
page.content: There are six people in my family, Harold my dad who is 38, Joan my mum who is 41, Stephen 14, myself 12, Esther 9, Anna 5. We moved down to Guildford from{South Shields}7 years ago in 1978. We live in a semi-detached house that was built about 1935. My dad was {unemployed}for a while but now works for a building firm. My mum works for an insurance company. My brother wants to be a craftsman but I have no ideas yet. Stephen and I go canoeing and fishing. Sometimes I play tennis with my dad and my sisters do ballet. For holidays we go to South Shields to see my nan and grandad. Sometimes I go to a church camp. At weekends we sometimes go out to picnics. On Sundays we go to the Baptist church.
